item.title: Doppelganger
item.description: Doppelganger Program: An Advanced LSASS Dumper with Process Cloning Author: vari.sh Overview The Doppelganger Program is an advanced Windows utility designed to obtain an LSASS (Local Security Authority Subsystem Service) dump from a cloned process, rather than the original one. By using process cloning techniques, the tool aims to bypass PPL (Process Protected Light), VBS (Virtualization Based Security), EDR/XDR detection mechanisms that typically monitor interactions with lsass.exe. The program achieves this by:
